ComicInfo.Title: I Write the Songs, I Write the Songs!; Monday Mourning; Have a Little Faith; Virtual Liabilities; Brian's Eggs; The Hang Nail Incident; A Novel Idea
ComicInfo.Summary:
I Write the Songs, I Write the Songs!: When Newt has to roll a new character he decides to play a bard.
Monday Mourning: When Sarah's character is killed everyone expects her to be upset.
Have a Little Faith: Bob's character is the last person standing and the rest of the groups doubts he can save the day.
Virtual Liabilities: B.A. promises to help Brian test his new computer game.
Brian's Eggs: Brian's character decides to raise his own Owlbears.
The Hang Nail Incident: When the groups role-playing characters are thrown out of a town they stretch the rules to create a begger army to return and get revenge.
A Novel Idea: Sara tries to organize a fantasy-themed book club.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 17:14:09. [CVDB181792] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-14 06:53:57. [Issue ID 89643]
ComicInfo.Writer: David S. Kenzer,Jolly Roger Blackburn,Steve Johansson
ComicInfo.Characters: Newt Forager,Pete Ashton,Gordo Sheckberry,Stevil Van Hostle,Victor Ferguson
ComicInfo.Teams: The Knights of the Dinner Table,Black Hand Gaming Society
